pkgmetadata.longdescription: Transformed Ornstein-Uhlenbeck Model for Adsorption Kinetics // Estimates the parameters of a Transformed Ornstein-Uhlenbeck (TOU) stochastic model for adsorption data and also the parameters of the related pseudo-n-order (PNO) model, such as the maximum adsorption capacity (qe), the adsorption rate constant (kn) and the order of the model (n).
